str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pleres; to make replete, i.e. to cram, level up, or to furnish, satisfy, execute, finish, verify, etc.
Pain, grief, sorrow, affliction. Apparently a primary word; sadness.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
